summary: The video provides a tour of a dog-friendly room at Estelle Manor, showcasing various amenities and facilities. The narrator highlights the spacious stables room, which is included due to their presence with a small animal. The room features a foyer with dog supplies like poo bags and treats, birthday-themed snacks (macarons), and a mini-bar stocked with beverages and snacks that incur additional charges. The bathroom includes a vanity area, shower, and an assortment of toiletries such as a sewing kit, intimacy kit, condoms, dental kit, shaving kit, and sanitary kit. The bedroom is equipped with a TV and wardrobe space. The narrator notes the high cost of the room (£650-£750 per night) and expresses curiosity about the pricing of rooms without a dog.
keywords: Estelle Manor, dog-friendly room, stables room, mini-bar, snacks, birthday, macarons, toiletries, sewing kit, intimacy kit, condoms, dental kit, shaving kit, sanitary kit, bedroom, TV, wardrobe, £650, £750, high cost, dog accommodation
